general.description: Orbiting the gas giant Irol, this large double-cylinder habitat is one of the Free Adrimai strongholds in the sector, and the first waypoint on the road from Irilia space to Son of the Eclipse. It protects the 6-jumps so-called "Road of Perils" to Skaeth Border Station, bordering on Gham Garri space, where, despite heavy patrols from both stations, Adrim exfiltration ships often get attacked.
general.bar: Several Rithai, most of them Adrimai, and some Pupeteers
